name: Calm Wellness
description: Calm and meditative atmosphere with blur effects and warm gradients.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Soft, rounded, and breathable. Encourage mindfulness through UI. Heavy use of blurs and gradients.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Pastel tones, warm accents (amber/teal). Avoid stark black or white. Soft gradients.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Fully rounded buttons (pill). Glassmorphism effects. Large border radius (16px+).
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Maintain sufficient contrast despite soft aesthetic.
